definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: PACAP, Rat pituitary adenylate cyclase activating polypeptide.
sentences.chinese: 大鼠垂体腺苷酸环化酶激活肽。

sentences.english: This leads to stimulation of adenyl cyclase which also is located on the cell surface.
sentences.chinese: 这会刺激位于细胞表面上的腺苷酸环化酶。

sentences.english: Application of samarium diiodide in mediating intramolecular cyclization reactions was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 综述了二碘化钐在分子内环化反应中的应用。

sentences.english: Cyclization occurs readily with dilute alkali .

sentences.chinese: 化学结构属于环化邻苯海拉明。

sentences.english: The enzyme, cyclodextrin glycosyltransferase, converts starch into cyclodextrins via an intramolecular transglycosylation reaction.
sentences.chinese: 它可通过环化作用将淀粉转化成环糊精。

sentences.english: Radical cyclization is a powerful method for the synthesis of cyclic compounds.
sentences.chinese: 自由基环化反应是合成环状化合物的有力工具之一。

sentences.english: The major process to study DNA instinctive flexibility is DNA cyclization assay.
sentences.chinese: DNA分子的环化是研究其本身柔韧性的主要方法。

sentences.english: PACAP, Mouse pituitary adenylate cyclase activating polypeptide.
sentences.chinese: 小鼠垂体腺苷酸环化酶激活肽。

sentences.english: The side chain structure of the β-alkyl naphthalenes studied influences significantly their way of dehydrocyclization.
sentences.chinese: 烷基萘的烷基侧链结构对脱氢环化反应有明显的影响。

sentences.english: A possible mechanism for the cyclization reaction was suggested.
sentences.chinese: 提出了可能的环化反应机理。

definition: cytosine nucleotide (C, pairs with guanine G 鳥嘌呤|鸟嘌呤 in DNA and RNA)
